content: There’s one last bit of the Valley of Despair to search before backtracking to the next region. Climb out of the pit where the boss was to cross the fallen stone, and you’ll find a crack in the wall to sidle through.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Despair' and the sub-subsection 'The Loong’s Secret Tomb'.
The content is as follows:
There’s one last bit of the Valley of Despair to search before backtracking to the next region. Climb out of the pit where the boss was to cross the fallen stone, and you’ll find a crack in the wall to sidle through.
